title: Into the Depths by Patrick Reilly
author: Patrick Reilly
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Into the Depths by Patrick Reilly

Skip to content
Issue 24 – September 2008Cover ArtInto the DepthsPatrick been working as an illustrator since he was 15. He has illustrated and designed merchandise (t-shirts, ads, brochures, packaging) for Disney, Universal, and Warner Brothers. He recently started working as an artist with Radical Comics.

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
